I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired

I read my favorite book, The Little Prince, to the boy scouts.
i work all the time.
I live a quiet life and enjoy my own company.

content.text: Hey! I'm participant_1. Nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! I'm participant_2.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love reading, I'm an avid reader! I also love to spend time with my cat, he's my best friend.
That's awesome! I love reading too, my favorite book is The Little Prince. I also love animals, I have a soft spot for stuffed animals.
That's so funny, I love The Little Prince too! I've read it so many times, it's one of my favorites.
It's so good, right? I love the way it teaches you to look at the world through the eyes of a child.
Yes, it's such a beautiful and inspiring book.
What do you do for work?
I'm an osteopath, I've been at my current job for six years.
That's so cool! I've never met an osteopath before.
It's a great job, I love helping people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you enjoy your job.
Thanks! I'm always learning new things, so it keeps me on my toes.
That's great! I love learning new things too.
So, what else do you like to do?
I love going for walks, I try to go for a walk every day.
That's a great way to get some exercise! I need to start going for more walks.
It's really nice, especially when the weather is nice.
Yes, it is! I love being outside.
Me too
